front.title: Cleartext Considered Obsolete: Use of Transport Layer Security (TLS) for Email Submission and Access
front.abstract: This specification outlines current recommendations for the use of Transport Layer Security (TLS) to provide confidentiality of email traffic between a Mail User Agent (MUA) and a Mail Submission Server or Mail Access Server. This document updates RFCs 1939, 2595, 3501, 5068, 6186, and 6409.
